meanings.definition: A type of Mexican sandal with a woven leather upper.
meanings.sent1: I bought a pair of huarachos for my vacation.
meanings.sent2: The huarachos were comfortable to wear on the beach.
meanings.sent3: My friend tripped over his huarachos and landed in the sand.
meanings.sent4: The huarachos danced across the sandy shore with each step.
meanings.sent5: The colorful huarachos stood out against the white sand.

meanings.sent1: The huarachos were neatly lined up by the door.
meanings.sent2: She wore her huarachos to the fiesta.
meanings.sent3: The huarachos sat patiently in the shoe rack.
meanings.sent4: The huarachos added a touch of tradition to the outfit.
meanings.sent5: The huarachos clacked softly on the wooden floor.
